color: black, purple, blue, pink, or silver
preset_modes: 10 preset modes (e.g. close-up, sports, soft skin)

effects: 21 advanced filters (soft focus, skin softening, big eyes, etc.)
sensor_size: 23.6mm x 15.6mm (APS-C) X-Trans CMOS II with primary color filter
long_exposure: up to 30 minutes with bulb mode

ISO: up to 51200 ISO with little noise
